Auth.dontHaveAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up
Auth.signupIpError: An account has already been created from this IP address.

Rooms.selectOrCreateRoomPrompt: Select a room from the panel on the left or create a new one to get started.
Rooms.leaveRoomConfirmation: Are you sure you want to leave Room #{code}? This action cannot be undone. You will need to join again using the room code.
Rooms.offlineRoomsPrompt: Connect to the internet once to download your rooms for offline use.

Room.splitEqually: This cost will be split equally among all members.
Room.oweFullAmount: You will owe the full amount to the group.
Room.offlineRoomDataError: This room's data isn't saved for offline use.
Room.requestQueued: Request queued. It will sync when you're back online.
Room.deleteEntryConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this entry? This action will permanently remove the record and cannot be undone.
Room.deleteEntryFailed: Failed to delete the entry. Please try again.
Room.deleteEntrySyncing: Cannot delete an entry that is still syncing.

Offline.title: You are offline
Offline.message1: The page you are trying to access has not been saved for offline use.
Offline.message2: Please connect to the internet and try again. Previously visited pages may be available.

Notifications.requestQueued: Request queued. It will sync when you're back online.
Notifications.offlineReady: App is ready for offline use
Notifications.pendingSync: {count, plural, =0{} one{# item pending sync.} other{# items pending sync.}}
